com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.infrastructure.services

Interface SecurityPrincipalService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        CloseableAuthentication authenticate(SecurityPrincipal principal)
        Creates an Authentication for the SecurityPrincipal and sets it as the security context for the current thread. This will apply the default authorities returned by SecurityPrincipal.getAuthorities() to the authenticated scope.
        Parameters:
        principal - Principal that should authenticate.
        Returns:
        instance that can be used to reset to the previous authentication upon closing

      • clearAuthentication

        void clearAuthentication()
        Clears the authentication of the current thread.

      • getPrincipalByName

        <T extends SecurityPrincipal> Optional<T> getPrincipalByName(String principalName)

      • getPrincipalById

        <T extends SecurityPrincipal> Optional<T> getPrincipalById(SecurityPrincipalId securityPrincipalId)

      • publishRenameEvent

        void publishRenameEvent(String oldPrincipalName,
                        String newPrincipalName)
